name: Devil Moon
description:
Welcome to the world of Devil Moon!

Devil Moon is a parody of some of the best games from the 1990's!

Here you will see references to games like Diablo, Harvest Moon, Pokémon, Dragon Quest and much more! If you grew playing games from that time, be sure to check it out!
This game was made during the RPG Maker MZ game jam 2021!
